title: # 482 - Rosebud Baker & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedian Rosebud Baker. We talk about vaping, Norm Macdonald passing, panic attacks, losing her sister at a young age, the hardest I’ve ever cried, and much more! 

 

Rosebud’s Special "Whiskey Fists": https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IMCm1V6Z1s4&t=510s 

 

Follow Rosebud here

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/rosebudbaker 

 

 

This episode is brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Candid. Get started from home for just $15 with a Candid starter kit at http://www.candidco.com/bert and use the code “Bert”.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Podium. Go to http://www.podium.com/bert and get started today for free.

 

This episode is also brought to you by Grunt Style. Go to http://www.gruntstyle.com/discount/bert for an additional 10% off your first order of any items. 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. Go to http://www.forhims.com/bertcast for your free visit.

 

This episode is also brought to you by http://www.Nuts.com. Get free shipping on your first order when you text “BERT” to 64-000.
